radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild, diffuse bronchial-wall thickening, mildly enlarged lymph nodes in the paracardiac region, porta hepatis, mesentery, and retroperitoneum.
Enlarged periportal lymph nodes, mild splenomegaly, no focal lesions in liver, pancreas, kidneys, spleen, or adrenal glands.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bronchial-wall thickening, lymphadenopathy in the axillae (largest node 2.3 cm by 1.3 cm), enlarged right epicardial lymph node (1.5 cm by 1.1 cm), enlarged nodes in the portacaval, peripancreatic, and mesenteric regions (largest node 4.2 cm by 2.9 cm).
FDG-avid lymph nodes in axillae, paracardial region, and near the right internal thoracic artery, enlargement of liver and spleen with diffuse FDG uptake.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: FDG-PET with CT for attenuation correction
radiographic_examinations.findings: Splenomegaly, stably enlarged FDG-avid lymph nodes in axillae, internal thoracic artery region, paracardiac region, and retroperitoneum. No hilar lymphadenopathy, diffuse mild smooth bronchial-wall thickening.
